titles.title: Edward J. Dwight, Jr. Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2025
Edward J. Dwight, Jr. Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2025
A bill to award a Congressional Gold Medal to Edward J. Dwight, Jr., the first African American astronaut candidate in the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
